translations: n.补丁；斑块（patch 的复数）；修补程序

phrs.translation: 在有些部分；在有些时候
n. [医]斑片试验；皮肤过敏试验
与…不能比，比不上；远不如…，远不及，比…差得远

sentences.sentence: I sewed patches on the knees of my jeans.
sentences.translation: 我在我的牛仔裤膝部打了个补丁。

sentences.sentence: The grass was browning in patches.
sentences.translation: 草地一片片地变成褐色。

sentences.sentence: Patches of fog will clear by mid-morning.
sentences.translation: 上午十时左右，团团浓雾将散去。
